name: 鄭建科
objective:
資訊都市主義（informatical urbanism 或 informational urbanism）為一跨領域學科，旨在透過資訊環境與流程之輔助，推動政策、規劃、發展、策略行動、設計之都市與社區進程。
本課程主要在協助學生，以都市與社區問題為基本導向，建立資訊環境與流程之規劃能力。
授課主要涵蓋面向：1. 資訊與知識基礎設施 2. 經濟面向 3. 都市治理與公共行政 4. 都市空間之資訊化 5. 地點因子 6. 使用者行為 7. 特殊議題 8. 研究認識論。
Informatical urbanism (or informational urbanism) is an interdisciplinary area of knowledge, and it mainly utilize the facilitation of informatical environments and procedures for the progression of policy, planning, development, strategic initiative, and design within cities and communities.
During this course, student will acquire the planning capability of establish such applicable informatical environments and procedures, based upon explorations of urban and community issues.
Main contents of this course: 1. Information and knowledge infrastructures, 2. Economic aspects, 3. Urban governance and administration, 4. Informaticalization of urban space, 5. Location factors, 6. User behavior, 7. Focus area of problem, 8. Problematic of the research of informatical urbanism.
